identity.mission: Create a 'Tactical Command' interface that feels like a military-grade tool, not a generic SaaS dashboard. Prioritize density, precision, and situational awareness.
principles: Fusion: Mix 'Sci-Fi HUD' aesthetics with 'Financial Terminal' density.
Content: Data is the hero. No decorative fluff.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in low-light (dark mode) environments.

fonts.usage: Body text, long descriptions, form inputs

rules: Headings (Barlow Condensed) must be uppercase for top-level sections.
Never use Inter for main page titles.
Widgets must stretch to fill height ('h-full').
Avoid large empty whitespace; use 'border-r' or 'border-b' to define areas instead of gaps.

cards.style: Sharp edges (rounded-none or rounded-sm). 1px border (white/10). No shadow by default.
cards.hover: Border becomes cyan-500/30. Subtle inner glow.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-600 hover:bg-cyan-500 text-white rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider font-bold text-xs px-6 py-2
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 hover:border-white/40 text-white rounded-sm uppercase tracking-wider text-xs px-6 py-2

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-cyan-500/50 rounded-sm font-mono text-sm

navigation.sidebar: bg-[#09090b] border-r border-white/10 w-64 fixed h-full

visual_enhancers.scanlines: Overlay a subtle repeating linear gradient (scanline) on the background or specific 'terminal' widgets.
visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use 'drop-shadow-[0_0_8px_rgba(6,182,212,0.5)]' for active states or critical alerts.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-black/40 border border-white/10' for floating panels (modals, tooltips).
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'border-collapse' logic where possible. Grid lines should feel structural.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for standard UI. Use 'phosphor-icons' (Duotone) for feature icons if available.

libraries.charts: Recharts (customized with dark theme colors and custom tooltips)
libraries.maps: react-map-gl or leaflet (with dark custom tiles)
libraries.motion: framer-motion (use 'easeOut' and 'duration: 0.2' for snappy, mechanical feel)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links to the public/index.html or import in index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (cyan, slate, zinc) and font families.
3. FORCE DARK MODE: Ensure the app defaults to dark mode. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
4. BUILD LAYOUT: Create a 'Shell' component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar. Use the 'Bento Grid' logic for the dashboard home.
5. CUSTOMIZE SHADCN: Override default rounded corners. Make them 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none'. Remove default shadows from cards.
6. DATA DENSITY: Do not use comfortable spacing. Use 'compact' spacing. Information density is key for this persona.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
